name: The Bitcoin DeFi Bible
description: Complete guide to Bitcoin DeFi, SlowFi, and OP_NET technology. Covers AMMs (Motoswap), BTC-native trading (NativeSwap), yield farming (MotoChef), non-custodial staking (Proof of HODL), stablecoins (OP-20S), token deployment, and farming strategies on Bitcoin Layer 1.
